bane_of_arthropods.name: Bane of Arthropods
bane_of_arthropods.summary: Increases damage and applies Slowness IV to arthropod mobs (spiders, cave spiders, silverfish, endermites and bees).

binding_curse.name: Curse of Binding
binding_curse.summary: Items cannot be removed from armor slots, except in Creative mode or due to death or breaking.

channeling.name: Channeling
channeling.summary: Trident "channels" a bolt of lightning toward a hit entity. Functions only during thunderstorms and if target is unobstructed with opaque blocks.

frost_walker.name: Frost Walker
frost_walker.summary: Turns water beneath the player into frosted ice and prevents the damage the player would take from standing on magma blocks.

loyalty.name: Loyalty
loyalty.summary: Trident returns after being thrown. Higher levels reduce return time.

luck_of_the_sea.name: Luck of the Sea
luck_of_the_sea.summary: Increases rate of good loot (enchanting books, etc.)

mending.name: Mending
mending.summary: Repair the item while gaining XP orbs.

multishot.name: Multishot
multishot.summary: Shoot 3 arrows at the cost of one; only one arrow can be recovered.

projectile_protection.name: Projectile Protection
projectile_protection.summary: Reduces projectile damage such as damage from arrows, thrown tridents, ghast and blaze fireballs, etc.

riptide.name: Riptide
riptide.summary: Trident launches player with itself when thrown. Functions only in water or rain.

soul_speed.name: Soul Speed
soul_speed.summary: Increases walking speed on soul sand or Soul Soil.

thorns.name: Thorns
thorns.summary: Reflects some of the damage taken when hit, at the cost of reducing durability with each proc.
